Package org.ow2.bonita.identity.auth

Contains support of Bonita authentication.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BonitaIdentityLoginModule This LoginModule is used to verify a user identity against Bonita authentication service.
BonitaPrincipal  
BonitaRemoteLoginModule This LoginModule does not perform any identity check, meaning that anybody providing a username and password can log in.
LocalStorageLoginModule This LoginModule is used only in the case where bonita engine and clients run on the same server It does not perform any identity check, meaning that anybody providing a username and password can log in
PlainLoginModule  
SecurityContext  
StorageLoginModule This LoginModule is used only in the case of an heavy Bonita client (standalone, only one JVM, no J2EE).
 

Exception Summary
BadLoginOptionException  
MissingOptionException  
 

Package org.ow2.bonita.identity.auth Description

Contains support of Bonita authentication. (internal use only)
